analysis.Summary: Vue.js single-file component that renders a task object as a styled card, displaying its name, description, status, and assignee.
analysis.Purpose: Provide a reusable, presentational block in the governance module for displaying individual task details in a card format.

Components.name: CardTaskItem
Components.responsibility: Accepts a `task` prop and renders its properties (name, description, status, assignedTo) in a card layout.

Functions.name: defineProps
Functions.purpose: Declare and validate incoming component props.

parameters.name: task
parameters.description: The task data to display, must include name, description, status, assignedTo fields.

analysis.Usage: Imported into a parent Vue component (e.g. in modules/governance/views) and used in the template as `<CardTaskItem :task="someTaskObject" />`.
Notes: No local `<style>` block; relies on global or parent styles for `.card` class.

Can be extended with slots or additional styling if needed.
